description.zh-cn: 中华民国北洋政府时期的政府首脑，为中华民国国务院的首长。1914年至1916年间曾被袁世凯改设为“国务卿”。1928年6月国民政府统一中国后，该职位被行政院院长取代。
description.en: The head of government during the Beiyang Government period of the Republic of China, leading the State Council. The title was changed to 'Secretary of State' (国务卿) by Yuan Shikai between 1914 and 1916. After the nominal unification of China by the Nationalist Government in June 1928, the position was replaced by the President of the Executive Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国北洋政府时期的内阁机构。1914年至1916年间曾被改为政事堂。
description.en: The cabinet body during the Beiyang Government period of the Republic of China. It was replaced by the 'Hall of State Affairs' (政事堂) between 1914 and 1916.

description.zh-cn: 指中华民国1912年至1928年间，由北洋军阀所主导的中华民国中央政府，首都位于北京。
description.en: Refers to the central government of the Republic of China from 1912 to 1928, dominated by the Beiyang warlords, with its capital in Beijing.

en: President of the Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华民国北洋政府时期的国家元首。
description.en: The head of state during the Beiyang Government period of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代著名政治家、军事家，北洋军阀的奠基人，曾担任中华民国临时大总统和正式大总统。
description.en: A prominent Chinese politician and military figure in the modern era, founder of the Beiyang Army, who served as the Provisional President and official President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 由中国国民党建立的中华民国国民政府，在1928年北伐成功后名义上统一了中国。
description.en: The national government of the Republic of China established by the Kuomintang, which nominally unified China after the success of the Northern Expedition in 1928.

description.zh-cn: 指1928年6月国民政府通过北伐战争，在名义上结束了北洋军阀的统治，实现了中国的统一。
description.en: Refers to the nominal unification of China in June 1928 by the Nationalist Government through the Northern Expedition, ending the rule of the Beiyang warlords.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国行政院的最高首长，1928年后取代国务总理成为政府首脑。
description.en: The head of the Executive Yuan of the Republic of China, who replaced the Premier of the State Council as the head of government after 1928.

en: Provisional Constitution of the Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的第一部宪法性质的法律，确立了内阁制。
description.en: The first constitutional law of the Republic of China, which established a cabinet system.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国第一任国务总理。
description.en: The first Premier of the State Council of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代民主革命的伟大先行者，中华民国和中国国民党的缔造者，曾任中华民国临时大总统。
description.en: A great pioneer of the modern democratic revolution in China, founder of the Republic of China and the Kuomintang, who served as the Provisional President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国初年政治人物。
description.en: A political figure in the early years of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国初年外交家、政治人物，曾多次担任国务总理及国务卿。
description.en: A diplomat and politician in the early years of the Republic of China, who served multiple times as Premier and Secretary of State.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国初年政治人物，曾任国务总理，后因涉嫌宋教仁遇刺案而辞职。
description.en: A political figure in the early years of the Republic of China, who served as Premier and later resigned due to alleged involvement in the assassination of Song Jiaoren.

description.zh-cn: 指1913年国民党领袖宋教仁在上海被刺杀的事件，此事件被认为是二次革命的导火索。
description.en: Refers to the assassination of Kuomintang leader Song Jiaoren in Shanghai in 1913, an event considered a trigger for the Second Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期政治家，皖系军阀首领。曾多次出任国务总理、国务卿，并在1924年至1926年间担任中华民国临时执政。
description.en: A politician during the Republic of China period and leader of the Anhui clique. He served multiple times as Premier and Secretary of State, and was the Provisional Chief Executive of the Republic of China from 1924 to 1926.

description.zh-cn: 1913年孙中山及国民党发动的旨在反对袁世凯独裁统治的武装革命。
description.en: An armed revolution launched in 1913 by Sun Yat-sen and the Kuomintang to oppose the autocratic rule of Yuan Shikai.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国初年政治人物，曾代理国务总理。
description.en: A political figure in the early years of the Republic of China who served as Acting Premier.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国初年政治家、教育家，曾任国务总理。
description.en: A politician and educator in the early years of the Republic of China who served as Premier.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国初年政治人物，曾两次担任国务总理。
description.en: A political figure in the early years of the Republic of China who served as Premier on two occasions.

description.zh-cn: 1914年5月1日，袁世凯将国务院改为政事堂，直属于大总统府。1916年6月29日恢复国务院建制。
description.en: On May 1, 1914, Yuan Shikai changed the State Council to the 'Hall of State Affairs' (政事堂), directly under the Presidential Palace. The State Council was restored on June 29, 1916.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国北洋政府时期政治家，曾任国务卿，后于1918年至1922年间担任中华民国大总统。
description.en: A politician during the Beiyang Government period of the Republic of China, who served as Secretary of State and later as President of the Republic of China from 1918 to 1922.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国北洋政府时期政治家，曾两次担任中华民国大总统。
description.en: A politician during the Beiyang Government period of the Republic of China, who served twice as President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1917年7月由张勋领导的，旨在恢复清朝统治的未遂政变。
description.en: An unsuccessful coup d'état led by Zhang Xun in July 1917, aimed at restoring the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国初年军阀，因率领辫子军发动复辟帝制的政变而闻名。
description.en: A warlord in the early Republic of China, famous for leading the 'Pigtail Army' in a coup to restore the monarchy.

description.zh-cn: 清朝最后一位皇帝，也是中国历史上最后一位皇帝。在张勋复辟事件中被短暂复辟。
description.en: The last emperor of the Qing dynasty and the last emperor of China. He was briefly restored to the throne during the Zhang Xun Restoration.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代外交家、法学家，曾代理国务总理。
description.en: A modern Chinese diplomat and jurist who served as Acting Premier.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国初年政治人物，曾任国务总理。
description.en: A political figure in the early years of the Republic of China who served as Premier.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国初年政治人物，曾代理国务总理。
description.en: A political figure in the early years of the Republic of China who served as Acting Premier.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国北洋政府时期政治家，直系军阀首领之一，曾任中华民国大总统。
description.en: A politician during the Beiyang Government period of the Republic of China, one of the leaders of the Zhili clique, who served as President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国北洋政府时期政治家，曾两次担任国务总理。
description.en: A politician during the Beiyang Government period of the Republic of China, who served as Premier on two occasions.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国北洋政府时期军事家、政治家，曾任国务总理。
description.en: A military strategist and politician during the Beiyang Government period of the Republic of China, who served as Premier.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国北洋政府时期政治家，曾任国务总理。
description.en: A politician during the Beiyang Government period of the Republic of China, who served as Premier.

description.zh-cn: 1919年5月4日在中国北京爆发的一场爱国学生运动，对中国近代史产生了深远影响。
description.en: A patriotic student movement that erupted in Beijing, China on May 4, 1919, which had a profound impact on modern Chinese history.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国北洋政府时期政治家，曾代理国务总理。
description.en: A politician during the Beiyang Government period of the Republic of China, who served as Acting Premier.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国北洋政府时期直系军阀的首领之一。
description.en: One of the leaders of the Zhili clique of warlords during the Beiyang Government period of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国北洋政府时期政治家，曾两度出任国务总理。
description.en: A politician during the Beiyang Government period of the Republic of China, who served twice as Premier.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国北洋政府时期的一个政治派系，由段祺瑞的皖系军阀所操控。
description.en: A political faction during the Beiyang Government period of the Republic of China, controlled by Duan Qirui's Anhui clique.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代海军将领，曾代理国务总理。
description.en: A modern Chinese naval admiral who served as Acting Premier.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国北洋政府时期外交家、政治家，曾多次出任国务总理。
description.en: A diplomat and politician during the Beiyang Government period of the Republic of China, who served multiple times as Premier.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国北洋政府时期政治家，交通系首领，曾任国务总理。
description.en: A politician during the Beiyang Government period of the Republic of China, leader of the Communications Clique, who served as Premier.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国北洋政府时期的军阀派系之一。
description.en: One of the warlord factions during the Beiyang Government period of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国北洋政府时期政治家，曾代理国务总理，并短暂代理大总统。
description.en: A politician during the Beiyang Government period of the Republic of China, who served as Acting Premier and briefly as Acting President.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期法学家、政治家、外交家，曾任国务总理。
description.en: A jurist, politician, and diplomat during the Republic of China period, who served as Premier.

description.zh-cn: 1922年围绕财政总长罗文干的政治事件，导致王宠惠内阁总辞。
description.en: A political incident in 1922 surrounding Minister of Finance Luo Wengan, which led to the resignation of Wang Chonghui's cabinet.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期外交家，曾代理国务总理。
description.en: A diplomat during the Republic of China period who served as Acting Premier.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国北洋政府时期军事家、政治家，曾任国务总理。
description.en: A military strategist and politician during the Beiyang Government period of the Republic of China, who served as Premier.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国北洋政府时期政治家，曾代理国务总理，并摄行大总统职权。
description.en: A politician during the Beiyang Government period of the Republic of China, who served as Acting Premier and exercised the powers of the President.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期政治家，曾被黎元洪任命为代理国务总理，但未获承认。
description.en: A politician during the Republic of China period, who was appointed Acting Premier by Li Yuanhong but was not recognized.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国北洋政府时期直系军阀首领，曾通过贿选当选为中华民国大总统。
description.en: Leader of the Zhili clique during the Beiyang Government period of the Republic of China, who was elected President of the Republic of China through bribery.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期政治人物，曾任财政总长。
description.en: A political figure during the Republic of China period, who served as Minister of Finance.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国著名外交家，曾多次代理及担任国务总理。
description.en: A prominent diplomat of the Republic of China, who served multiple times as Acting and official Premier.

description.zh-cn: 1924年发生在中国直系军阀和奉系军阀之间的一场大规模内战。
description.en: A large-scale civil war that took place in China in 1924 between the Zhili and Fengtian warlord cliques.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国北洋政府时期政治家，曾任国务总理并代理大总统。
description.en: A politician during the Beiyang Government period of the Republic of China, who served as Premier and Acting President.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国北洋政府时期政治家，曾任国务总理。
description.en: A politician during the Beiyang Government period of the Republic of China, who served as Premier.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国北洋政府时期政治家，曾任国务总理。
description.en: A politician during the Beiyang Government period of the Republic of China, who served as Premier.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国北洋政府时期外交家、政治家，曾代理国务总理并摄行临时执政职权。
description.en: A diplomat and politician during the Beiyang Government period of the Republic of China, who served as Acting Premier and exercised the powers of the Provisional Chief Executive.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国北洋政府时期的军阀派系之一，以张作霖为首。
description.en: One of the warlord factions during the Beiyang Government period of the Republic of China, led by Zhang Zuolin.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国北洋政府时期海军将领，曾代理国务总理并摄行大总统职权。
description.en: A naval admiral during the Beiyang Government period of the Republic of China, who served as Acting Premier and exercised the powers of the President.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国北洋政府最后一任国务总理。
description.en: The last Premier of the State Council of the Beiyang Government of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国北洋政府时期奉系军阀首领，1927年至1928年间任安国海陆军大元帅，为当时中国的实际统治者。
description.en: Leader of the Fengtian clique during the Beiyang Government period of the Republic of China. He served as Generalissimo of the Army and Navy of the Anguo Government from 1927 to 1928, making him the de facto ruler of China at the time.

description.zh-cn: 1928年6月4日，日本关东军在沈阳附近的皇姑屯火车站策划的、针对奉系军阀首领张作霖的暗杀事件。
description.en: An assassination of the Fengtian clique leader Zhang Zuolin on June 4, 1928, planned by the Japanese Kwantung Army at Huanggutun railway station near Shenyang.

description.zh-cn: 大日本帝国陆军的一个重要组成部分，因策划皇姑屯事件、九一八事变等侵华行动而臭名昭著。
description.en: An important component of the Imperial Japanese Army, notorious for planning aggressive actions in China such as the Huanggutun incident and the Mukden Incident.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国北洋政府时期的军阀派系之一，以段祺瑞为首。
description.en: One of the warlord factions during the Beiyang Government period of the Republic of China, led by Duan Qirui.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国初期袁世凯去世后分裂形成的军阀集团，主导了1916年至1928年的中国政治。
description.en: Warlord factions that emerged after the death of Yuan Shikai in the early Republic of China, dominating Chinese politics from 1916 to 1928.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国北洋政府时期的官僚派系之一，以梁士诒为首。
description.en: A bureaucratic faction during the Beiyang Government period of the Republic of China, led by Liang Shiyi.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国务总理是中华民国国务院的首长。
description.en: The Premier of the State Council is the head of the State Council of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国务总理是中华民国北洋政府时期的政府首脑。
description.en: The Premier of the State Council was the head of government during the Beiyang Government period of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 国务总理由中华民国大总统任命。
description.en: The Premier of the State Council was appointed by the President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 袁世凯担任大总统时，曾将国务总理改设为“国务卿”，并将国务院改为“政事堂”。
description.en: While serving as President, Yuan Shikai changed the title of Premier of the State Council to 'Secretary of State' and the State Council to the 'Hall of State Affairs'.

description.zh-cn: 1928年6月，国民政府于名义上统一中国。
description.en: In June 1928, the Nationalist Government nominally unified China.

description.zh-cn: 随着国民政府统一中国，国务总理一职被行政院院长取代。
description.en: With the unification of China by the Nationalist Government, the position of Premier of the State Council was replaced by the President of the Executive Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国务总理是行政院院长职位的前身。
description.en: The Premier of the State Council was the predecessor to the position of President of the Executive Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 根据《中华民国临时约法》，临时大总统需任命一个以总理为首的内阁。
description.en: According to the Provisional Constitution of the Republic of China, the Provisional President was required to appoint a cabinet headed by a premier.

description.zh-cn: 因任命王芝祥为直隶都督事与袁世凯总统不和而辞职。
description.en: Resigned due to a disagreement with President Yuan Shikai over the appointment of Wang Zhixiang as the Governor of Zhili.

position.zh-cn: 代理国务总理，国务总理，代理国务卿，国务卿
position.en: Acting Premier, Premier, Acting Secretary of State, Secretary of State

position.zh-cn: 代理国务总理，国务总理

description.zh-cn: 赵秉钧因涉嫌宋教仁遇刺案称病辞去国务总理职务。
description.en: Zhao Bingjun resigned from the premiership, citing illness, due to alleged involvement in the assassination of Song Jiaoren.

position.zh-cn: 代理国务总理，国务卿，国务总理
position.en: Acting Premier, Secretary of State, Premier

description.zh-cn: 段祺瑞因奉命率军镇压二次革命而离任代理总理。
description.en: Duan Qirui left his post as Acting Premier to lead troops to suppress the Second Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 徐世昌因不满袁世凯实行帝制而请辞国务卿。
description.en: Xu Shichang resigned as Secretary of State due to his dissatisfaction with Yuan Shikai's implementation of a monarchy.

description.zh-cn: 因对德参战案与黎元洪总统政见不和，段祺瑞被免去总理职务。
description.en: Duan Qirui was dismissed as Premier due to political disagreements with President Li Yuanhong over China's participation in World War I.

description.zh-cn: 张勋领导军队在北京发动兵变，推动清废帝溥仪复辟。
description.en: Zhang Xun led troops to stage a coup in Beijing, promoting the restoration of the deposed Qing emperor Puyi.

description.zh-cn: 李经羲因张勋复辟而解职。
description.en: Li Jingxi was dismissed from office due to the Zhang Xun Restoration.

description.zh-cn: 段祺瑞在张勋复辟失败后，于7月14日复任国务总理。
description.en: After the failure of the Zhang Xun Restoration, Duan Qirui was reappointed Premier of the State Council on July 14.

description.zh-cn: 段祺瑞因与代总统冯国璋就“统一中国”方式政见不和而辞职。
description.en: Duan Qirui resigned due to political disagreements with Acting President Feng Guozhang over the method of 'unifying China'.

description.zh-cn: 因五四运动影响，钱能训内阁总辞。
description.en: The cabinet of Qian Nengxun resigned en masse due to the influence of the May Fourth Movement.

description.zh-cn: 龚心湛因不堪直系吴佩孚电斥而请辞兼职。
description.en: Gong Xinzhan resigned from his concurrent post after being denounced by Wu Peifu of the Zhili clique.

description.zh-cn: 靳云鹏因受安福系压迫而请辞。
description.en: Jin Yunpeng resigned due to pressure from the Anfu Club.

description.zh-cn: 梁士诒因直系将领反对，并于直奉战争失败后被免职。
description.en: Liang Shiyi was opposed by Zhili clique generals and was dismissed after their defeat in the Zhili-Fengtian War.

description.zh-cn: 罗文干案发生后，王宠惠通电请辞国务总理。
description.en: After the Luo Wengan case occurred, Wang Chonghui telegraphed his resignation from the premiership.

description.zh-cn: 孙宝琦与财长王克敏互相排挤，因总统曹锟偏袒王克敏而辞职。
description.en: Sun Baoqi and Minister of Finance Wang Kemin were rivals; Sun resigned because President Cao Kun sided with Wang.

description.zh-cn: 第二次直奉战争爆发，顾维钧内阁改组去职。
description.en: The Second Zhili-Fengtian War broke out, leading to the resignation of Gu Weijun's cabinet following a reshuffle.

description.zh-cn: 杜锡珪因奉系反对，于正式内阁会议后即行辞职。
description.en: Du Xigui resigned immediately after a formal cabinet meeting due to opposition from the Fengtian clique.

description.zh-cn: 日本关东军策划皇姑屯事件，暗杀了张作霖。
description.en: The Japanese Kwantung Army planned the Huanggutun incident, assassinating Zhang Zuolin.

description.zh-cn: 张作霖在皇姑屯事件中被炸身亡。
description.en: Zhang Zuolin was killed in the Huanggutun incident.

description.zh-cn: 潘复因张作霖在皇姑屯事件被杀而解职。
description.en: Pan Fu was dismissed from office because Zhang Zuolin was killed in the Huanggutun incident.
